headline: Uber (UBER) Net Margins Jump to 33.5%, Challenging Skeptics on Profit Durability
summary: Uber Technologies (UBER) reported revenue growth that is forecast at 12.4% per year, exceeding the broader US market rate of 10.5%. Profitability stands out after several strong years, with Uber achieving a 68.5% compound annual growth in earnings over the past five years and most recently posting annual earnings growth of 278%. Net profit margins have also surged, now at 33.5% compared to last year's 10.5%. This highlights a dramatic improvement for shareholders. Investors are likely to...
